query.q: M::`logstash`:(AVG(`health_runtime_status`))

charts.name: Pipeline 运行 work 的数量

query.q: M::`logstash`:(AVG(`pipeline_workers`))

charts.name: Logstash进程使用的打开文件描述符的数量

query.q: M::`logstash`:(AVG(`process_open_file_descriptors`))

charts.name: 配置重新加载失败次数

query.q: M::`logstash`:(AVG(`reloads_failures`))
M::`logstash`:(AVG(`process_mem_total_virtual_in_bytes`))

charts.name: Pipeline配置重新加载失败次数

query.q: M::`logstash`:(AVG(`pipeline_reloads_failures`))

charts.name: Logstash进程使用的打开文件描述符的数量

query.q: M::`logstash`:(AVG(`process_open_file_descriptors`)) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }
M::`logstash`:(AVG(`process_mem_total_virtual_in_bytes`)) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }

charts.name: Logstash 进程 cpu 负载

query.q: M::`logstash`:(AVG(`process_cpu_load_average_1m`) AS `1 分钟平均负载`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }
M::`logstash`:(AVG(`process_cpu_load_average_5m`) AS `5 分钟平均负载`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }
M::`logstash`:(AVG(`process_cpu_load_average_15m`) AS `15 分钟平均负载`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }
M::`logstash`:(AVG(`jvm_threads_count`)) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }
M::`logstash`:(AVG(`jvm_mem_heap_used_percent`)) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }
M::`logstash`:(AVG(`jvm_mem_pools_old_used_in_bytes`) AS `老年代使用内存`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }
M::`logstash`:(AVG(`jvm_mem_pools_young_used_in_bytes`) AS `青年代使用内存`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }
NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE("M::`logstash`:(AVG(`jvm_gc_collectors_old_collection_count`) AS `老年代 gc 次数`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }")
NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE("M::`logstash`:(AVG(`jvm_gc_collectors_young_collection_count`) AS `青年代 gc 次数`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }")
NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE("M::`logstash`:(AVG(`jvm_gc_collectors_old_collection_time_in_millis`) AS `老年代 gc 时间`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }")
NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE("M::`logstash`:(AVG(`jvm_gc_collectors_young_collection_time_in_millis`) AS `青年代 gc 时间`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }")
NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`logstash`:(AVG(`pipeline_events_in`) AS `进入Pipeline 事件数`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' } BY `plugin_inputs_id`")
NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`logstash`:(AVG(`pipeline_events_out`) AS `流出Pipeline 事件数`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' } BY `plugin_outputs_id`")
NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`logstash`:(AVG(`pipeline_events_filtered`) AS `Pipeline 过滤事件数`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' } BY `plugin_filters_id`")

charts.name: Pipeline 中事件持续时间变化率

query.alias: Pipeline 中事件持续时间变化率
query.q: NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`logstash`:(AVG(`pipeline_events_duration_in_millis`) AS `Pipeline 中事件持续时间变化率`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' }")

charts.name: Pipeline filters 事件数变化率

query.alias: 进入 Pipeline filters 变化率
query.q: NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`logstash`:(AVG(`pipeline_plugins_filters_events_in`) AS `进入 Pipeline filters 变化率`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' } BY `plugin_filters_id`")

query.alias: 流出 Pipeline filters 变化率
query.q: NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`logstash`:(AVG(`pipeline_plugins_filters_events_out`) AS `流出 Pipeline filters 变化率`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' } BY `plugin_filters_id`")

charts.name: Pipeline Inputs 事件数变化率

query.alias: 流出 Pipeline Inputs 事件数变化率
query.q: NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`logstash`:(AVG(`pipeline_plugins_inputs_events_out`) AS `流出 Pipeline Inputs 事件数变化率`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' } BY `plugin_inputs_id`")

charts.name: Pipeline Outputs 事件数变化率

query.alias: 进入 Pipeline outputs 变化率
query.q: NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`logstash`:(AVG(`pipeline_plugins_outputs_events_in`) AS `进入 Pipeline outputs 变化率`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' } BY `plugin_filters_id`")

query.alias: 流出 Pipeline outputs 变化率
query.q: NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`logstash`:(AVG(`pipeline_plugins_outputs_events_out`) AS `流出 Pipeline outputs 变化率`) { `host` = '#{host}' and `version` = '#{version}' } BY `plugin_filters_id`")
